messages.subject: Re: "killer dogs"
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tia, I am certainly no expert but I figure take the dogs natural instincts and train it to work FOR you instead of AGAINST you.  Example:  Our dogs are
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tia,

I am certainly no expert but I figure take the dogs natural instincts and
train it to work FOR you instead of AGAINST you. Example: Our dogs are
herding breeds. The instinct that drives herding behavior is hunting and
killing sheep and goats. Without training, our dogs might well attack the
goats. I have bought books and videos and have started training them as
stock dogs. It involves me working with the dog on a long lead in the goat
pen.

Could your dog not be trained to retrieve rather than kill?

Just a thought.

Julie
